cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2935, VA Beneficiary Debt Collection Improvement Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 75 (Friday, April 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PAPPAS:
H.R. 2935.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United States
Constitution
[Page H2135]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 22 - 6.

title: VA Beneficiary Debt Collection Improvement Act
